courseDescription:
As the home to the world's largest community of professionals and experts, LinkedIn is a platform that has not only hosted these professionals but has also transformed numerous individuals into leaders in their respective fields. However, deeming yourself a professional LinkedIn user can be a journey in itself. By learning how to use LinkedIn to advance your career, you can also pick up skills that will make you proficient in one of the most popular professional social networking sites, which is a great asset for you and your company. 

Although LinkedIn is a social platform, it works quite differently from other social media sites. While the principles such as profile pictures and adding connections may seem similar to sites like Facebook, LinkedIn has many other features that elevate it to its status as a professional social network. In this course, we will explore the importance of creating connections with others in your field and how to make your job search easier.

This course will help you improve your own LinkedIn profile and offer you the tools to become a coach for those starting their journey on LinkedIn. This field has become very popular. This course is designed to cater to the needs of such future LinkedIn trainers by going into detail to explain how to avoid common mistakes on LinkedIn, the correct way of building a profile, job hunting strategies and more. So why wait? Become an expert on LinkedIn today.

Start Course Now
